Package group10.client.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
group10.client.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
@Component public class GameController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for Game screen. Implements Initializable interface
Author:
Alperen Caykus, Mustafa Ozan Alpay
See Also:
Initializable
